SalesforceContract.name: SalesforceContract
SalesforceContract.description: Read-only virtual object used in the Your Account App.

BillingAddressCity.description: Details for the billing address. Maximum size is 40 characters.

BillingAddressCountry.description: Details for the billing address of this contract. Maximum size is 80 characters.

BillingAddressPostalCode.description: Details for the billing address of this contract. Maximum size is 20 characters.

BillingAddressState.description: Details for the billing address of this contract. Maximum size is 80 characters.

BillingAddressStreet.description: Street address for the billing address of this contract.

BillingEmail.description: Email address for billing this contract.

BillingPhone.description: Phone number for billing this contract.

ExternalId.description: External reference ID set by Salesforce.

FirstNameOnCreditCard.description: Cardholder’s first name on the credit card.

LastNameOnCreditCard.description: Cardholder’s last name on the credit card.

ShippingAddressCity.description: Details of the shipping address. City maximum size is 40 characters.

ShippingAddressCountry.description: Details of the shipping address. Country maximum size is 80 characters.

ShippingAddressPostalCode.description: Details of the shipping address. Postal code maximum size is 20 characters.

ShippingAddressState.description: Details of the shipping address. State maximum size is 80 characters.

ShippingAddressStreet.description: The street address of the shipping address. Maximum of 255 characters.
